##### Virulence Factors database (VFDB)

* GFF: ``r vfdb_gff``

Overview:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
if (file.info(vfdb_gff)$size > 0) {
df <- read.delim(vfdb_gff, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df } else {cat("The gff file for this database is empty. Or the database was not used, or no element were found!")}
```
